me.Salt.Util.Utility.Games

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Salt.Util.Utility.Games.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a handler for all different types of Games. An instance of Game is registered under a user. When attempting to play a game, the bot need only identify the game owner's ID, and the type of game being played.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.HashMap<net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.User,java.util.List<Game>> userGames
      A HashMap with a nested List of Game instances.

    • Constructor Detail

        public GameManager()

    • Method Detail

      • registerGame

        public static void registerGame(net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.User user,
                                Game game)
        This method allows for the registration of a game to a specific User. If the user already exists within the userGames HashMap, the user is grabbed and their list of games updated to add the new game instance.
        Parameters:
        user - User - The User to register the game instance under
        game - Game - The Game instance to be registered to the specified user

      • unregisterGameFromUser

        public static void unregisterGameFromUser(net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.User user,
                                          Game game)
        This method unregisters a game from a specified user, if the user has an instance of the specified game.
        Parameters:
        user - User - The User that the game instance is registered to
        game - Game - The Game instance to be removed from the specified user

      • unregisterAllGamesFromUser

        public static void unregisterAllGamesFromUser(net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.User user)
        This method takes a specified user, and removes any game instances registered to their name.
        Parameters:
        user - User - The User that the game instance is registered to

      • hasGameOfType

        public static boolean hasGameOfType(net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.User user,
                                    java.lang.Class clazz)
        This method checks if a user has a game of a specific type, and returns a boolean reflecting the result.
        Parameters:
        user - User - The User that the game instance is registered to
        clazz - Class - The class of a Game implementation that should be queried
        Returns:
        Boolean - If the specified user has a game of the type specified

      • getGameOfType

        public static Game getGameOfType(net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.User user,
                                 java.lang.Class clazz)
        This method returns the instance of a specified game, registered to a specified user.

        This method should be called after using hasGameOfType(User, Class) to check if the user has a game instance of specified type. This method returns Null if no instance is found.

        Parameters:
        user - User - The User that the game instance is registered to
        clazz - Class - The class of a Game implementation that should be queried
        Returns:
        Possibly-null: A Game instance that was located, or null if no game instance was located

      • getUserGames

        public static java.util.HashMap<net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.User,java.util.List<Game>> getUserGames()
        Returns:
        userGames
